artist: Painter: After Maarten de Vos; Engraver: Charles François Adrien Macret
description: portrait of a man turned right and looking left with head resting on left shoulder; wearing soft hat, belted jacket and shirt with ruffle open at neck; holding an instrument(?) in PL hand; in an oval composition within a rectangle
dimension:
5 15/16 × 4 15/16 in. (15.08 × 12.54 cm) (image)
11 3/4 × 8 3/4 in. (29.85 × 22.23 cm) (sheet, plus 1 1/4" extension glued to left edge)
inscription:
Signature, and Inscription

below image in black: De Vos pinxit    C Macret sculp. / Du Cabinet de Mr. Poullain  | upper right corner in black: 26  |  in pencil on sheet: 2-577
portfolio: From Cabinet Poullain: Collection de cent-vingt estampes gravées d'après les tableaux & dessins que composoient le Cabinet de M. Poullain, plate 26
